name: A cube tale
description:
A cube tale is a single player or co-op platform and puzzle game, where the 2d and 3d world meet. The player must solve the puzzles to progress in the game.

Controls:

3D

movement: W A S D + mouse

 action: E

jump: space

2D

movement: J  L

jump: I

Programmers: João Machado, Victor Marquezini, Pedro Langbecker

Artist 3D: Eduardo Kemmerich
